title: Gallery : Women team prepare for City trip | Gallery | News
body_text:
Our women’s team have been getting ready for Sunday’s Barclays Women’s Super League game away to Manchester City.
Club photographer David Price braved the rainy conditions at Sobha Realty Training Centre on Friday morning and you can scroll through his gallery below.
It’s a 2.15pm kick-off at City’s Academy Ground on Sunday afternoon and supporters in the UK who aren’t at the match can watch the action live on BBC One.
